name: Heroes of Rome 2
description:
Caesar and Cleopatra were kidnapped by the Roman goddess Discordia!

Don't lose time and embark on a journey full of adventure, myths and legends.

Defeat terrible monsters and solve tricky tasks! Build new settlements, eliminate
destroy roads and face insurmountable obstacles in this exciting time management adventure.
Can you manage to free Caesar and Cleopatra from the clutches of the goddess of revenge in time?
Find out in the second part of this game series.
